thread.title: EUTV Receives Tier1 License to Provide Mobile Services for End Users and Other Organizations through Pioneering MVNA/MVNE Platforms in Brazil; Elephant Talk Selected to Execute EUTV's Full Mobile Services Platform
thread.title_full: EUTV Receives Tier1 License to Provide Mobile Services for End Users and Other Organizations through Pioneering MVNA/MVNE Platforms in Brazil; Elephant Talk Selected to Execute EUTV's Full Mobile Services Platform

author: PRNW
title: EUTV Receives Tier1 License to Provide Mobile Services for End Users and Other Organizations through Pioneering MVNA/MVNE Platforms in Brazil; Elephant Talk Selected to Execute EUTV's Full Mobile Services Platform
text:
SAO PAULO EUTV® Brazil aka Surf Telecom® today announced that the Company received a Tier 1 license by Anatel, the Brazilian National Telecommunications Agency to provide full mobile services for end users, as well as MVNA (Mobile Virtual Network Aggregator) and MVNE (Mobile Virtual Network Enabler) platforms to Brazilian MVNOs (Mobile Virtual Network Operators). The Company also announced that Elephant Talk Communications Corp. (NYSE MKT: ETAK) has been selected as the provider of its core virtualized software services platform which will enable Surf Telecom to provide superior services to end users and MVNOs in Brazil .
Yon Moreira , CEO of Surf Telecom stated, "Our Company is very happy to be officially licensed, the result of a three-year investment that will provide the Brazilian market's more than 280 million consumer mobile subscribers with an array of new service choices including simple, transparent services for 4G/IoT and pioneering MVNA/MVNE strategies designed to service current and future MVNOs. Native 4G services will bring subscribers the best-in-breed solutions at very competitive prices thanks to Anatel's commitment to increase competitiveness in the market. We are confident that Elephant Talk will prove to be an excellent partner, since their unique ET Software DNA® 2.0 Platform enables Surf Telecom to successfully execute on our business plans."
Martin Zuurbier , Co-President Mobile Platform Business Elephant Talk Communications, said, "We are very proud to have been selected by Surf Telecom after they thoroughly assessed the capabilities of our virtualized ET Software DNA® 2.0 platform. It is clear that we both share the belief that the operational deployment of our platform can add substantial value to mobile subscribers seeking better services at attractive prices. Elephant Talk welcomes the partnership with Surf Telecom as we enter the vibrant Brazilian mobility market, a market ranked 5 th worldwide in 2014 based on the numbers of subscribers according to the International Telecommunications Union."
About EUTV:
EUTV Brazil is a pioneering telecom provider founded in 2008 by experts in telecom who have held senior positions in the most prestigious telecom companies worldwide. EUTV received a Tier 1 authorization from Anatel, the local regulatory body, to provide mobile services in the entire country for 4G, 3G, 2G and IoT technologies. Its brand Surf Telecom will provide services to end users, corporates, government segment and other MVNOs using its MNVE license and the Elephant Talk Communications ET Software DNA® 2.0 Platform. Visit: www.eutv.com.br
About Elephant Talk Communications Corp.:
Elephant Talk Communications Corp. (NYSE MKT: ETAK) is a global provider of mobile proprietary Software Defined Network Architecture (ET Software DNA® 2.0) platforms for the telecommunications industry and cyber security solutions. The Company empowers Mobile Network Operators (MNOs), Mobile Virtual Network Operators (MVNOs), Enablers (MVNEs) and Aggregators (MVNAs) with a full suite of applications, superior industry expertise and high quality customer service without the need for substantial upfront investment. Elephant Talk counts on several of the world's leading MNOs and technology companies amongst its customers and partners, including Vodafone, T-Mobile, Zain, HP and Affirmed Networks. Visit: www.elephanttalk.com .
